short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads all images or a selected image from the current webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Image Downloader makes it easy to download images from any webpage. You can choose to download all images with one click or select a specific image to download by simply clicking on it. This extension provides a fast and convenient way to save multiple images or just the ones you need, making it user-friendly and efficient for all types of browsing.
